pullrequest.title: Fix setting the Field of View

content.raw: It does look better on beefy. Previously Gazebo stereo was way more nausea-inducing than glxgears, and on this branch it's the same. (Though given how glxgears looks to me, I'm starting to think I can't look at stereo without getting a headache.)
content.html: It does look better on beefy. Previously Gazebo stereo was way more nausea-inducing than glxgears, and on this branch it's the same. (Though given how glxgears looks to me, I'm starting to think I can't look at stereo without getting a headache.)
